name: Space Inferno
description:
Space Inferno - our remake of the classic space invaders with a bit of extra craziness..

Default Controls: [A]+[D] Move, (LMB) Fire.

(You can also customize the keys in the front end.)

Leaderboards: Local only right now. -Can tweet from within game.

**Global Leaderboards coming soon**.

(highest scores right now are around 18,000)

#shmupjam
